description:
Alessio is having a rough day going over his team's losing streak and what he can do about. Frustrated with what he is doing, Nick comes in to see if he can leave for the night. Alessio apologizes for his attitude but reminds Nick that he has been thinking about his raise a lot more and he wants to give it to him very soon. Nick is excited about the offer but then Alessio says that the only way he can get the raise is that he has to suck his cock. Nick takes a step back laughing thinking it's only a joke, but it's not joke and down to his knees he goes. Eager for his raise Nick gulps down the hard dick with oozing precum. Alessio is taking full advantage of this situation. Fully naked and already sucking cock Alessio decides it's time to bend Nick's sweet cute ass over to fully implement the raise. Nick wants the raise bad and he shows it by spreading his ass wide for the hard dick. Eventually Nick forgets all about the raise and can only focus on being fucked in multiple positions by this dark hunk.

Enjoy!
title: Need A Raise
